meanings.definition: Not accompanied by an escort or guide.
meanings.sent1: The child wandered unescorted through the park.
meanings.sent2: She felt nervous walking unescorted at night.
meanings.sent3: The lost puppy looked unescorted but was actually leading a secret mission.
meanings.sent4: The unescorted ship sailed bravely into the storm.
meanings.sent5: The unescorted traveler felt a sense of freedom and independence.

meanings.sent1: The unescorted teenager explored the museum on her own.
meanings.sent2: He preferred to travel unescorted to feel more independent.
meanings.sent3: The unescorted cat pretended to be lost to get extra treats.
meanings.sent4: Her unescorted heart longed for companionship.
meanings.sent5: The unescorted student enjoyed the solitude of studying alone.
